children.text: Installing... This may take a few moments
This pack is installed on your device but no longer available online.

Download this pack to identify the birds from the forested bluffs and rocky beaches of Oregon and Washington to the many national forests and parks in the Sierra Nevada and Cascade Range, and the unique birdlife in the Mojave Desert.

Text written by Jessie Barry and Luke Seitz.

Audio from the Macaulay Library at the Cornell Lab of Ornithology.
